data.introduce: 退票是指旅客因各种原因将已购买并打印的机票退回给航空公司的过程。退票过程涉及旅客和航空公司。传统退票是在航信主机系统中使用TRFD指令来创建电子客票退票单实现退票。自动退票服务可以在线实现自动退票的功能，以方便代理人客户使用。
data.business:
目前，自动退票服务不支持按航段进行退票。对于一张要退票的电子客票来说，自动退票服务会将该票上所有未使用的航段一起退掉。对所退的机票必须满足以下条件：
该票在出票前是使用国内运价自动计算指令（PATA）或国际运价自动计算指令（QTE+DFSQ:A）来计算所订航段的运价；
该票的出票PNR已经被取消；
支持联票（备注：所有联票一次性退）；
data.functions:
目前，自动退票服务可以实现以下功能：
自动计算退票费
代理人客户在正式确认退票前，可先使用该功能了解下具体的退票费用信息。这时，服务会返回所退票号的退票单信息供客户查看。
提交退票单
如果代理人客户确认要提交退票单，可使用该功能完成退票单的提交。这时，服务会返回退票单号。退票单提交成功，需再自行确认票面以及结算是否操作成功。
不支持同时操作多张票进行退票，只支持单张票申请退票。
暂不支持非NI证件号
data.requestSchema:
[{"name":"TES_AirTicketRefundRQ","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航空电子客票退票请求信息","children":[{"name":"POS","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Point Of Sale","children":[{"name":"Source","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"？：？请求者信息","children":[{"name":"RequestorID","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"请求者代码","children":[{"name":"@Type","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"@ID_Context","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"ID上下文类型","children":[]},{"name":"@ID","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"请求者代码","children":[]}]},{"name":"@PseudoCityCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Office号：？ 代理人Office号，如:PEK099","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"TicketRefundInfoDetails","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"退票请求详细信息列表","children":[{"name":"TicketRefundInfoDetail","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"退票请求项：表示一个具体的退票请求信息","children":[{"name":"BookingReferenceID","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"预定相关信息：PNR信息非必填","children":[{"name":"@ID","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"预定标识号：PNR号","children":[]},{"name":"@ID_Context","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"预定标识号上下文：PNR号标志","children":[]}]},{"name":"TicketItemInfo","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"票面信息","children":[{"name":"ConjunctiveTicket","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"联票信息","children":[{"name":"@TicketNumber","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"票号","children":[]}]},{"name":"@TicketNumber","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"票号","children":[]}]},{"name":"PrinterInfo","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"打票机信息：表示打票机信息","children":[{"name":"@Number","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"打票机号：表示打票机号","children":[]},{"name":"@Type","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"打票机类型：表示打票机类型(1、BSP_DOMESTIC_ETICKET ——BSP国内
2、BSP_INTERNATIONAL_ETICKET——BSP国际
3、BOP_DOMESTIC_ETICKET——BOP国内
4、BOP_INTERNATIONAL_ETICKET——BOP国际
5、AIRLINE_DOMESTIC_ETICKET——AL国内（C系统本票）
6、AIRLINE_INTERNATIONAL_ETICKET——AL国际（C系统本票)
7、 CDS_DOMESTIC_ETICKET  ——CDS国内
8、 CDS_INTERNATIONAL_ETICKET ——CDS国际）","children":[]}]},{"name":"@ReturnRefundFormInfoInd","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"是否显示退票单信息：用来表示退票成功后，是否显示退票单信息","children":[]},{"name":"@ConfirmRefundInd","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"是否确认退票：表示本次请求操作类型：为true表示退票，为false表示自动计算退票费","children":[]},{"name":"@CancelSeatInd","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"是否取消座位","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"@EchoToken","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"@TimeStamp","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"@Version","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"@Target","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"@CancelSeatInd","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"是否取消座位","children":[]},{"name":"@OperationNo","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"操作单号","children":[]},{"name":"@ConfirmRefundInd","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"是否确认退票，若为true会直接退票，若为false表示查看自动生成的退票单信息","children":[]},{"name":"@ReturnRefundFormInfoInd","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"是否返回退票单信息","children":[]},{"name":"@CheckSegStatusInd","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"是否校验航段状态","children":[]}]}]
data.responseSchema: [{"name":"TES_AirTicketRefundRS","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航空电子客票退票响应信息","children":[{"name":"Success","type":"string","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"退票单提交成功：返回SUCCESS，表示退票单提交成功，需再自行确认票面以及结算是否操作成功。","children":[]},{"name":"Warnings","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"警告信息集合","children":[{"name":"Warning","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"警告信息","children":[{"name":"Trace","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"错误详细描述或者内部异常信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"编码","children":[]},{"name":"@Text","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"文本","children":[]}]},{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误代码","children":[]},{"name":"@Type","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误类型：对应错误类型名称","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortText","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误信息","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortTextZH","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"警告信息(中文)：对应中文错误信息","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"Errors","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误信息集合","children":[{"name":"Error","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"错误信息","children":[{"name":"Trace","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"错误详细描述或者内部异常信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"编码","children":[]},{"name":"@Text","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"文本","children":[]}]},{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误代码（数字）","children":[]},{"name":"@Type","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误类型","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortText","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误描述信息（英文）","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"RefundFormDetails","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"处理结果列表","children":[{"name":"RefundFormDetail","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"处理结果","children":[{"name":"BookingReferenceID","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"预定相关信息：表示预定时的PNR号","children":[{"name":"@ID","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"预定标识号","children":[]},{"name":"@ID_Context","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"预定标识号上下文","children":[]}]},{"name":"RefundForm","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"退票单","children":[{"name":"RefundFormInfo","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"退票单信息","children":[{"name":"Remark","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"备注信息：一般包含两项文本信息","children":[{"name":"Text","type":"string","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"自由文本备注信息","children":[]}]},{"name":"CouponNumber","type":"string","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"票证编号：最多包含四项","children":[]},{"name":"Taxes","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"税信息列表","children":[{"name":"Tax","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"税信息：最多包含27项税","children":[{"name":"@TaxCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"税代码：税的名称","children":[]},{"name":"@Amount","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"基础代理费","children":[]},{"name":"@CurrencyCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"支付货币代码","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"PrinterInfo","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"打票机：表示退票时使用的打票机信息","children":[{"name":"@Number","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"打票机号","children":[]},{"name":"@Type","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"打票机类型","children":[]}]},{"name":"PaymentInfo","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"支付信息","children":[{"name":"CreditCardInfo","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"信用卡信息","children":[{"name":"@CardNumber","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"信用卡号","children":[]}]},{"name":"@PaymentType","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"支付类型","children":[]},{"name":"@CurrencyCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"货币代码","children":[]}]},{"name":"CommissionInfo","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"代理费信息","children":[{"name":"Base","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"基础代理费信息","children":[{"name":"@Amount","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"基础代理费","children":[]},{"name":"@Percent","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"基础代理费率","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"PassengerName","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"旅客姓名信息","children":[{"name":"Surname","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"姓名的姓","children":[]}]},{"name":"TicketItemInfo","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"票面信息","children":[{"name":"ConjunctiveTicket","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"联票信息","children":[{"name":"@TicketNumber","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"票号","children":[]}]},{"name":"@TicketNumber","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"联票号","children":[]}]},{"name":"EtTxnResult","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"退票返回结果","children":[]},{"name":"@GrossRefund","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"毛退款额","children":[]},{"name":"@NetRefund","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"净退款额","children":[]},{"name":"@Deduction","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"扣款","children":[]},{"name":"@Check","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"CHECK 选项","children":[]},{"name":"@GroupInd","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"国航退团体票需要填的标记","children":[]}]},{"name":"@Number","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"退票单号","children":[]}]}]}]},{"name":"@EchoToken","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"@TimeStamp","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"@Version","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"@Target","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"@SequenceNmbr","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"@OperationNo","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"操作单号","children":[]}]}]
